#summary How to use sybase-proc-maven-plugin in your maven project.

= Plugin hosting =

The sybase-proc-maven-plugin is hosted on OSS SONATYPE repository, thus, in order to use it in your maven project you must add the OSS SONATYPE repository configuration to your pom.xml file.

Ton configure OSS SONATYPE repository add following code to your pom.xml

{{{
<repositories>
  <repository>
    <id>sonatype-oss-public</id>
    <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/</url>
    <releases>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
    </releases>
    <snapshots>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
    </snapshots>
  </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

To see all available downloads visit [https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/com/googlecode/msidor/maven/plugins/sybase-proc-maven-plugin/ OSS SONATYPE repository for sybase-proc-maven-plugin].
